parameters.name: almSetting
parameters.description: DevOps Platform configuration key. This parameter is optional if you have only one Azure integration.

parameters.name: newCodeDefinitionType
parameters.description:
Project New Code Definition Type
New code definitions of the following types are allowed:
  • PREVIOUS_VERSION
  • NUMBER_OF_DAYS
  • REFERENCE_BRANCH - will default to the main branch.

parameters.name: newCodeDefinitionValue
parameters.description:
Project New Code Definition Value
For each new code definition type, a different value is expected:
  • no value, when the new code definition type is PREVIOUS_VERSION and REFERENCE_BRANCH
  • a number between 1 and 90, when the new code definition type is NUMBER_OF_DAYS

parameters.description: DevOps Platform configuration key. This parameter is optional if you have only one BitBucket Cloud integration.

  • PREVIOUS_VERSION

  • no value, when the new code definition type is PREVIOUS_VERSION and REFERENCE_BRANCH
  • a number between 1 and 90, when the new code definition type is NUMBER_OF_DAYS

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. If not provided, main branch will be used.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Application key. A suitable key will be generated if not provided

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description:
Whether the created application should be visible to everyone, or only specific user/groups.
If no visibility is specified, the default visibility will be used.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project keys. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: projectBranch
parameters.description: Project branches. To set main branch, provide an empty value. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project keys. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: projectBranch
parameters.description: Project branches. To set main branch, provide an empty value. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Date in ISO 8601 datetime format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm) from which the logs will be returned. Inclusive.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Date in ISO 8601 datetime format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm) until which the logs will be returned. Inclusive.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Key of the component (project) to filter on

parameters.name: maxExecutedAt
parameters.description: Maximum date of end of task processing (inclusive)

parameters.name: onlyCurrents
parameters.description: Filter on the last tasks (only the most recent finished task by project)

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 1000

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string
  • task ids that are exactly the same as the supplied string

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Comma separated list of task statuses

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Key of the component (project) to filter on

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of the optional fields to be returned in response.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

The value length of the param must be between 2 and 15 (inclusive) characters. In case longer value is provided it will be truncated.

parameters.name: qualifiers
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • APP - Applications
  • VW - Portfolios
  • SVW - Portfolios
  • TRK - Projects

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Base component key. The search is based on this component.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

parameters.name: qualifiers
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • APP - Applications
  • VW - Portfolios
  • SVW - Portfolios
  • UTS - Test Files
  • FIL - Files
  • DIR - Directories
  • TRK - Projects

parameters.name: strategy
parameters.description:
Strategy to search for base component descendants:
  • children: return the children components of the base component. Grandchildren components are not returned
  • all: return all the descendants components of the base component. Grandchildren are returned.
  • leaves: return all the descendant components (files, in general) which don't have other children. They are the leaves of the component tree.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Component key. Only components with qualifiers TRK, VW, SVW, APP are supported

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Resolution of the Security Hotspot when new status is REVIEWED, otherwise must not be set.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: New status of the Security Hotspot.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of files. Returns only hotspots found in those files

parameters.name: hotspots
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Security Hotspot keys. This parameter is required unless project is provided.

parameters.name: inNewCodePeriod
parameters.description: If 'inNewCodePeriod' is provided, only Security Hotspots created in the new code period are returned.

parameters.name: onlyMine
parameters.description: If 'projectKey' is provided, returns only Security Hotspots assigned to the current user

parameters.name: owaspAsvs-4.0
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP ASVS v4.0 categories or rules.

parameters.name: owaspAsvsLevel
parameters.description: Filters hotspots with lower or equal OWASP ASVS level to the parameter value. Should be used in combination with the 'owaspAsvs-4.0' parameter.

parameters.name: owaspTop10
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP 2017 Top 10 lowercase categories.

parameters.name: owaspTop10-2021
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP 2021 Top 10 lowercase categories.

parameters.name: pciDss-3.2
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of PCI DSS v3.2 categories.

parameters.name: pciDss-4.0
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of PCI DSS v4.0 categories.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Key of the project or application. This parameter is required unless hotspots is provided.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: If 'project' is provided and if status is 'REVIEWED', only Security Hotspots with the specified resolution are returned.

parameters.name: sansTop25
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SANS Top 25 categories.

parameters.name: sonarsourceSecurity
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SonarSource security categories. Use 'others' to select issues not associated with any category

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: If 'project' is provided, only Security Hotspots with the specified status are returned.

parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description: Login of the assignee. When not set, it will unassign the issue. Use '_me' to assign to current user

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 100

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to authors that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: assign
parameters.description: To assign the list of issues to a specific user (login), or un-assign all the issues

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Add a comment. The comment will only be added to issues that are affected either by a change of type or a change of severity as a result of the same WS call.

parameters.name: set_severity
parameters.description: To change the severity of the list of issues

parameters.name: set_type
parameters.description: To change the type of the list of issues

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key.If this parameter is set, pullRequest must not be set.

parameters.name: projectKey
parameters.description: The project key for which the vulnerabilities are being fetched

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id.If this parameter is set, branch must not be set.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of the optional fields to be returned in response. Action plans are dropped in 5.5, it is not returned in the response.

parameters.name: assigned
parameters.description: To retrieve assigned or unassigned issues

parameters.name: assignees
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of assignee logins. The value '__me__' can be used as a placeholder for user who performs the request

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: SCM accounts. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: cleanCodeAttributeCategories
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Clean Code Attribute Categories

parameters.name: components
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of component keys. Retrieve issues associated to a specific list of components (and all its descendants). A component can be a portfolio, project, module, directory or file.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description:
To retrieve issues created after the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (use 'timeZone' attribute or it will default to server timezone) or datetime can be provided.
If this parameter is set, createdInLast must not be set

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Datetime to retrieve issues created during a specific analysis

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description:
To retrieve issues created before the given date (exclusive).
Either a date (use 'timeZone' attribute or it will default to server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

parameters.name: createdInLast
parameters.description: To retrieve issues created during a time span before the current time (exclusive). Accepted units are 'y' for year, 'm' for month, 'w' for week and 'd' for day. If this parameter is set, createdAfter must not be set

parameters.name: cwe
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of CWE identifiers. Use 'unknown' to select issues not associated to any CWE.

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of the facets to be computed. No facet is computed by default.

parameters.name: fixedInPullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id to filter issues that would be fixed in the specified project or branch by the pull request. Should not be used together with + 'pullRequest'. At least the 'components' must be be specified when this param is used.  Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: impactSeverities
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Software Quality Severities

parameters.name: inNewCodePeriod
parameters.description:
To retrieve issues created in the new code period.
If this parameter is set to a truthy value, createdAfter must not be set and one component uuid or key must be provided.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of languages. Available since 4.4

parameters.name: onComponentOnly
parameters.description: Return only issues at a component's level, not on its descendants (modules, directories, files, etc). This parameter is only considered when componentKeys is set.

parameters.name: owaspAsvs-4.0
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP ASVS v4.0 categories.

parameters.name: owaspTop10
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP Top 10 2017 lowercase categories.

parameters.name: owaspTop10-2021
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP Top 10 2021 lowercase categories.

parameters.name: pciDss-3.2
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of PCI DSS v3.2 categories.

parameters.name: pciDss-4.0
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of PCI DSS v4.0 categories.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: resolved
parameters.description: To match resolved or unresolved issues

parameters.name: rules
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of coding rule keys. Format is <repository>:<rule>

parameters.name: sansTop25
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SANS Top 25 categories.

parameters.name: scopes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of scopes. Available since 8.5

parameters.name: sonarsourceSecurity
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SonarSource security categories. Use 'others' to select issues not associated with any category

parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.description: To resolve dates passed to 'createdAfter' or 'createdBefore' (does not apply to datetime) and to compute creation date histogram

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags. All tags are removed if parameter is empty or not set.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Indicator to search for all tags or only for tags in the main branch of a project

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to tags that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: The size of the list to return, 0 for all languages

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A pattern to match language keys/names against

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of additional fields that can be returned in the response.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of additional fields that can be returned in the response.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Component key. The search is based on this component.

parameters.name: metricKeys
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of metric keys. Types DISTRIB are not allowed. For type DATA only maintainability_issues, reliability_issues, new_maintainability_issues, new_security_issues, new_reliability_issues, security_issues metrics are supported

parameters.name: metricPeriodSort
parameters.description: Sort measures by leak period or not ?. The 's' parameter must contain the 'metricPeriod' value.

parameters.name: metricSort
parameters.description: Metric key to sort by. The 's' parameter must contain the 'metric' or 'metricPeriod' value. It must be part of the 'metricKeys' parameter

parameters.name: metricSortFilter
parameters.description:
Filter components. Sort must be on a metric. Possible values are:
  • all: return all components
  • withMeasuresOnly: filter out components that do not have a measure on the sorted metric

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

parameters.name: qualifiers
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • APP - Applications
  • VW - Portfolios
  • SVW - Portfolios
  • UTS - Test Files
  • FIL - Files
  • DIR - Directories
  • TRK - Projects

parameters.name: strategy
parameters.description:
Strategy to search for base component descendants:
  • children: return the children components of the base component. Grandchildren components are not returned
  • all: return all the descendants components of the base component. Grandchildren are returned.
  • leaves: return all the descendant components (files, in general) which don't have other children. They are the leaves of the component tree.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Filter measures created after the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 1000

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull request id. Not available in the community edition.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
Filter measures created before the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type
New code definitions of the following types are allowed:
  • SPECIFIC_ANALYSIS - can be set at branch level only
  • PREVIOUS_VERSION - can be set at any level (global, project, branch)
  • NUMBER_OF_DAYS - can be set at any level (global, project, branch)
  • REFERENCE_BRANCH - can only be set for projects and branches

parameters.name: value
parameters.description:
Value
For each type, a different value is expected:
  • the uuid of an analysis, when type is SPECIFIC_ANALYSIS
  • no value, when type is PREVIOUS_VERSION
  • a number between 1 and 90, when type is NUMBER_OF_DAYS
  • a string, when type is REFERENCE_BRANCH

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel through which the notification is sent. For example, notifications can be sent by email.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Notification type. Possible values are for:
  • Global notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, SQ-MyNewIssues
  • Per project notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel through which the notification is sent. For example, notifications can be sent by email.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Notification type. Possible values are for:
  • Global notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, SQ-MyNewIssues
  • Per project notifications: CeReportTaskFailure, ChangesOnMyIssue, NewAlerts, NewFalsePositiveIssue, NewIssues, SQ-MyNewIssues

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
The permission you would like to grant to the group.
  • Possible values for global permissions: admin, gateadmin, profileadmin, provisioning, scan, applicationcreator, portfoliocreator
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
The permission you would like to grant to the user
  • Possible values for global permissions: admin, gateadmin, profileadmin, provisioning, scan, applicationcreator, portfoliocreator
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: analyzedBefore
parameters.description:
Filter the projects for which last analysis is older than the given date (exclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

parameters.name: onProvisionedOnly
parameters.description: Filter the projects that are provisioned

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Limit search to:
  • project names that contain the supplied string
  • project keys that are exactly the same as the supplied string

parameters.name: qualifiers
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers. Possible values are:
  • APP - Applications
  • TRK - Projects
  • VW - Portfolios

parameters.name: projectKeyPattern
parameters.description: Project key pattern. Must be a valid Java regular expression

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
The permission you would like to revoke from the group.
  • Possible values for global permissions: admin, gateadmin, profileadmin, provisioning, scan, applicationcreator, portfoliocreator
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
The permission you would like to revoke from the user.
  • Possible values for global permissions: admin, gateadmin, profileadmin, provisioning, scan, applicationcreator, portfoliocreator
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description:
Permission
  • Possible values for project permissions admin, codeviewer, issueadmin, securityhotspotadmin, scan, user

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to permission template names that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: qualifier
parameters.description:
Project qualifier. Filter the results with the specified qualifier. Possible values are:
  • APP - Applications
  • TRK - Projects
  • VW - Portfolios

parameters.name: projectKeyPattern
parameters.description: Project key pattern. Must be a valid Java regular expression

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key identifying the plugin to install

parameters.name: f
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of the additional fields to be returned in response. No additional field is returned by default. Possible values are:
  • category - category as defined in the Update Center. A connection to the Update Center is needed

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key identifying the plugin to uninstall

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key identifying the plugin to update

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Event category. Filter analyses that have at least one event of the category specified.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Filter analyses created after the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
Filter analyses created before the given date (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New name of the main branch

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Sets whether the branch should be protected from automatic deletion when it hasn't been analyzed for a set period of time.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 100

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to tags that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: analyzedBefore
parameters.description:
Filter the projects for which last analysis of any branch is older than the given date (exclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

parameters.name: onProvisionedOnly
parameters.description: Filter the projects that are provisioned

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Limit to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that contain the supplied string

parameters.name: qualifiers
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers

parameters.name: mainBranch
parameters.description: Key of the main branch of the project. If not provided, the default main branch key will be used.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the project. If name is longer than 500, it is abbreviated.

parameters.name: newCodeDefinitionType
parameters.description:
Project New Code Definition Type
New code definitions of the following types are allowed:
  • PREVIOUS_VERSION
  • NUMBER_OF_DAYS
  • REFERENCE_BRANCH - will default to the main branch.

parameters.name: newCodeDefinitionValue
parameters.description:
Project New Code Definition Value
For each new code definition type, a different value is expected:
  • no value, when the new code definition type is PREVIOUS_VERSION and REFERENCE_BRANCH
  • a number between 1 and 90, when the new code definition type is NUMBER_OF_DAYS

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description:
Whether the created project should be visible to everyone, or only specific user/groups.
If no visibility is specified, the default project visibility will be used.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Branch key. When not specified, if no Pull Request key is defined either, it will default to the main branch

parameters.name: pullRequest
parameters.description: Pull Request key. When not specified, the branch data will be returned instead

parameters.name: analyzedBefore
parameters.description:
Filter the projects for which the last analysis of all branches are older than the given date (exclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

parameters.name: onProvisionedOnly
parameters.description: Filter the projects that are provisioned

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Limit search to:
  • component names that contain the supplied string
  • component keys that contain the supplied string

parameters.name: qualifiers
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of component qualifiers. Filter the results with the specified qualifiers

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the quality gate to create

parameters.name: sourceName
parameters.description: The name of the quality gate to copy

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the quality gate to create

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description:
Condition metric.
Only metric of the following types are allowed:
  • INT
  • MILLISEC
  • RATING
  • WORK_DUR
  • FLOAT
  • PERCENT
  • LEVEL
Following metrics are forbidden:
  • alert_status
  • security_hotspots
  • new_security_hotspots

parameters.name: op
parameters.description:
Condition operator:
  • LT = is lower than
  • GT = is greater than

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the quality gate to delete

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project UUID. Doesn't work with branches or pull requests

parameters.name: currentName
parameters.description: Current name of the quality gate

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New name of the quality gate

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: To search for projects containing this string. If this parameter is set, "selected" is set to "all".

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to group names that contain the supplied string.

parameters.description: Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

parameters.name: q

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the quality gate to set as default

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the quality gate. Either id or name must be set

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description:
Condition metric.
Only metric of the following types are allowed:
  • INT
  • MILLISEC
  • RATING
  • WORK_DUR
  • FLOAT
  • PERCENT
  • LEVEL
Following metrics are forbidden:
  • alert_status
  • security_hotspots
  • new_security_hotspots

parameters.name: op
parameters.description:
Condition operator:
  • LT = is lower than
  • GT = is greater than

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Quality Profile key. Can be obtained through api/qualityprofiles/search

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Parameters as semi-colon list of key=value. Ignored if parameter reset is true.

parameters.name: reset
parameters.description: Reset severity and parameters of activated rule. Set the values defined on parent profile or from rule default values.

parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: Severity. Ignored if parameter reset is true.

parameters.name: activation
parameters.description: Filter rules that are activated or deactivated on the selected Quality profile. Ignored if the parameter 'qprofile' is not set.

parameters.name: active_severities
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of activation severities, i.e the severity of rules in Quality profiles.

parameters.name: available_since
parameters.description: Filters rules added since date. Format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: cleanCodeAttributeCategories
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Clean Code Attribute Categories

parameters.name: cwe
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of CWE identifiers. Use 'unknown' to select rules not associated to any CWE.

parameters.name: impactSeverities
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Software Quality Severities

parameters.name: inheritance
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of values of inheritance for a rule within a quality profile. Used only if the parameter 'activation' is set.

parameters.name: owaspTop10
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP Top 10 2017 lowercase categories.

parameters.name: owaspTop10-2021
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP Top 10 2021 lowercase categories.

parameters.name: qprofile
parameters.description: Quality profile key to filter on. Used only if the parameter 'activation' is set.

parameters.name: rule_key
parameters.description: Key of rule to search for

parameters.name: sansTop25
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SANS Top 25 categories.

parameters.name: severities
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of default severities. Not the same than severity of rules in Quality profiles.

parameters.name: sonarsourceSecurity
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SonarSource security categories. Use 'others' to select rules not associated with any category

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags. Returned rules match any of the tags (OR operator)

parameters.name: targetKey
parameters.description: Quality Profile key on which the rule activation is done. To retrieve a quality profile key please see api/qualityprofiles/search

parameters.name: targetSeverity
parameters.description: Severity to set on the activated rules

parameters.name: template_key
parameters.description: Key of the template rule to filter on. Used to search for the custom rules based on this template.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of types. Returned rules match any of the tags (OR operator)

parameters.name: parentQualityProfile
parameters.description:
New parent profile name.
If no profile is provided, the inheritance link with current parent profile (if any) is broken, which deactivates all rules which come from the parent and are not overridden.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: since
parameters.description:
Start date for the changelog (inclusive).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
End date for the changelog (exclusive, strictly before).
Either a date (server timezone) or datetime can be provided.

parameters.name: toName
parameters.description: Name for the new quality profile.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Quality Profile key. Can be obtained through api/qualityprofiles/search

parameters.name: targetKey
parameters.description: Quality Profile key on which the rule deactivation is done. To retrieve a profile key please see api/qualityprofiles/search

parameters.name: template_key
parameters.description: Key of the template rule to filter on. Used to search for the custom rules based on this template.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of types. Returned rules match any of the tags (OR operator)

parameters.name: exporterKey
parameters.description: Output format. If left empty, the same format as api/qualityprofiles/backup is used. Possible values are described by api/qualityprofiles/exporters.

parameters.name: qualityProfile
parameters.description: Quality profile name to export. If left empty, the default profile for the language is exported.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to projects that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

parameters.name: backup
parameters.description: A profile backup file in XML format, as generated by api/qualityprofiles/backup or the former api/profiles/backup.

parameters.name: defaults
parameters.description: If set to true, return only the quality profiles marked as default for each language

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language key. If provided, only profiles for the given language are returned.

parameters.name: preventReactivation
parameters.description: If set to true and if the rule has been deactivated (status 'REMOVED'), a status 409 will be returned

parameters.name: templateKey
parameters.description: Key of the template rule in order to create a custom rule

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: A language key; if provided, only repositories for the given language will be returned

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A pattern to match repository keys/names against

parameters.name: activation
parameters.description: Filter rules that are activated or deactivated on the selected Quality profile. Ignored if the parameter 'qprofile' is not set.

parameters.name: active_severities
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of activation severities, i.e the severity of rules in Quality profiles.

parameters.name: available_since
parameters.description: Filters rules added since date. Format is yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: cleanCodeAttributeCategories
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Clean Code Attribute Categories

parameters.name: cwe
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of CWE identifiers. Use 'unknown' to select rules not associated to any CWE.

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of additional fields to be returned in the response. All the fields are returned by default, except actives.

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of the facets to be computed. No facet is computed by default.

parameters.name: impactSeverities
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of Software Quality Severities

parameters.name: include_external
parameters.description: Include external engine rules in the results

parameters.name: inheritance
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of values of inheritance for a rule within a quality profile. Used only if the parameter 'activation' is set.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of OWASP Top 10 2017 lowercase categories.

parameters.name: sonarsourceSecurity
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SonarSource security categories. Use 'others' to select rules not associated with any category

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags. Returned rules match any of the tags (OR operator)

parameters.name: template_key
parameters.description: Key of the template rule to filter on. Used to search for the custom rules based on this template.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of types. Returned rules match any of the tags (OR operator)

parameters.name: actives
parameters.description: Show rule's activations for all profiles ("active rules")

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to tags that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the rule to update

parameters.name: markdownDescription
parameters.description: Rule description (mandatory for custom rule and manual rule) in markdown format

parameters.name: markdown_note
parameters.description: Optional note in markdown format. Use empty value to remove current note. Note is not changed if the parameter is not set.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Parameters as semi-colon list of <key>=<value>, for example 'params=key1=v1;key2=v2' (Only when updating a custom rule)

parameters.name: remediation_fn_base_effort
parameters.description: Base effort of the remediation function of the rule

parameters.name: remediation_fn_type
parameters.description: Type of the remediation function of the rule

parameters.name: remediation_fy_gap_multiplier
parameters.description: Gap multiplier of the remediation function of the rule

parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: Rule severity (Only when updating a custom rule)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Rule status (Only when updating a custom rule)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Optional comma-separated list of tags to set. Use blank value to remove current tags. Tags are not changed if the parameter is not set.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Component key. Only keys for projects, applications, portfolios or subportfolios are accepted.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Component key. Only keys for projects, applications, portfolios or subportfolios are accepted.

parameters.name: fieldValues
parameters.description: Setting field values. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Setting value. To reset a value, please use the reset web service.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Setting multi value. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: commits_by_line
parameters.description: Group lines by SCM commit if value is false, else display commits for each line, even if two consecutive lines relate to the same commit.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: First line to return. Starts at 1

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: First line to return. Starts at 1

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The new level. Be cautious: DEBUG, and even more TRACE, may have performance impacts.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the logs to get

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description for the new group. A group description cannot be larger than 200 characters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name for the new group. A group name cannot be larger than 255 characters and must be unique. The value 'anyone' (whatever the case) is reserved and cannot be used.

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of the fields to be returned in response. All the fields are returned by default.

parameters.name: managed
parameters.description: Return managed or non-managed groups. Only available for managed instances, throws for non-managed instances.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to names that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: currentName
parameters.description: Name of the group to be updated.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: New optional description for the group. A group description cannot be larger than 200 characters. If value is not defined, then description is not changed.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New optional name for the group. A group name cannot be larger than 255 characters and must be unique. Value 'anyone' (whatever the case) is reserved and cannot be used. If value is empty or not defined, then name is not changed.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to names or logins that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

parameters.name: expirationDate
parameters.description: The expiration date of the token being generated, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD). If not set, default to no expiration.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: User login. If not set, the token is generated for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: projectKey
parameters.description: The key of the only project that can be analyzed by the PROJECT_ANALYSIS_TOKEN being generated.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Token Type. If this parameters is set to PROJECT_ANALYSIS_TOKEN, it is necessary to provide the projectKey parameter too.

parameters.name: previousPassword
parameters.description: Previous password. Required when changing one's own password.

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Specify if the user should be authenticated from SonarQube server or from an external authentication system. Password should not be set when local is set to false.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: User password. Only mandatory when creating local user, otherwise it should not be set

parameters.name: scmAccount
parameters.description: List of SCM accounts. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: anonymize
parameters.description: Anonymize user in addition to deactivating it

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Limit search to group names that contain the supplied string.

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: Depending on the value, show only selected items (selected=selected), deselected items (selected=deselected), or all items with their selection status (selected=all).

parameters.name: deactivated
parameters.description: Return deactivated users instead of active users

parameters.name: externalIdentity
parameters.description:
Find a user by its external identity (ie. its login in the Identity Provider).
This is case sensitive and only available with Administer System permission.

parameters.name: lastConnectedAfter
parameters.description:
Filter the users based on the last connection date field.
Only users who interacted with this instance at or after the date will be returned.
The format must be ISO 8601 datetime format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hhmm)

parameters.name: lastConnectedBefore
parameters.description:
Filter the users based on the last connection date field.
Only users that never connected or who interacted with this instance at or before the date will be returned.
The format must be ISO 8601 datetime format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hhmm)

parameters.name: managed
parameters.description: Return managed or non-managed users. Only available for managed instances, throws for non-managed instances.

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less or equal than 500

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Filter on login, name and email.
This parameter can either perform an exact match, or a partial match (contains), it is case insensitive.

parameters.name: slLastConnectedAfter
parameters.description:
Filter the users based on the sonar lint last connection date field
Only users who interacted with this instance using SonarLint at or after the date will be returned.
The format must be ISO 8601 datetime format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hhmm)

parameters.name: slLastConnectedBefore
parameters.description:
Filter the users based on the sonar lint last connection date field.
Only users that never connected or who interacted with this instance using SonarLint at or before the date will be returned.
The format must be ISO 8601 datetime format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hhmm)

parameters.name: scmAccount
parameters.description: SCM accounts. To set several values, the parameter must be called once for each value.

parameters.name: newExternalIdentity
parameters.description: New external identity, usually the login used in the authentication system. If not provided previous identity will be used.

parameters.name: newExternalProvider
parameters.description: New external provider. Only authentication system installed are available. Use 'LDAP' identity provider for single server LDAP setup.Use 'LDAP_{serverKey}' identity provider for multiple LDAP servers setup.

parameters.name: newLogin
parameters.description: The new login. It must not already exist.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: Key of the application to be added

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio where the application will be added

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio where a reference will be added

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio to be added

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the would-be parent portfolio

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description for the new portfolio, can be left blank

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key for the new portfolio. A suitable key will be generated if not provided

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Key of the parent portfolio, when creating a sub portfolio

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description:
Whether the created portfolio or application should be visible to everyone, or only specific user/groups.
Only applies to root portfolios. If no visibility is specified, the default visibility will be used.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio to move

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio to move

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the would-be parent portfolio

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: Key of the application to be removed

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Key of the referenced portfolio to be removed

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio or sub-portfolio to update

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio or sub-portfolio to update

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Selects a branch in all matched projects, instead of using their main branches

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio or sub-portfolio to update

parameters.name: regexp
parameters.description: A valid regexp with respect to the JDK's ``java.util.regex.Pattern`` class

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Selects a branch in all matched projects, instead of using their main branches

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio or sub-portfolio to update

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Selects a branch in all matched projects, instead of using their main branches

parameters.name: portfolio
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio or sub-portfolio to update

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags. It's not possible to set nothing.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of the portfolio to update

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name displayed in the administration console of webhooks

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The key of the project that will own the webhook

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: If provided, secret will be used as the key to generate the HMAC hex (lowercase) digest value in the 'X-Sonar-Webhook-HMAC-SHA256' header

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Server endpoint that will receive the webhook payload, for example 'http://my_server/foo'. If HTTP Basic authentication is used, HTTPS is recommended to avoid man in the middle attacks. Example: 'https://myLogin:myPassword@my_server/foo'

parameters.name: webhook
parameters.description: The key of the webhook to be deleted, auto-generated value can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list

parameters.name: ceTaskId
parameters.description: Id of the Compute Engine task

parameters.name: ps
parameters.description: Page size. Must be greater than 0 and less than 500

parameters.name: webhook
parameters.description: Key of the webhook that triggered those deliveries, auto-generated value that can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: If provided, secret will be used as the key to generate the HMAC hex (lowercase) digest value in the 'X-Sonar-Webhook-HMAC-SHA256' header. If blank, any secret previously configured will be removed. If not set, the secret will remain unchanged.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: new url to be called by the webhook

parameters.name: webhook
parameters.description: The key of the webhook to be updated, auto-generated value can be obtained through api/webhooks/create or api/webhooks/list

parameters.name: include_internals
parameters.description: Include web services that are implemented for internal use only. Their forward-compatibility is not assured
